name: The Warp Coin Catastrophe
description:
The Warp World Crew is in trouble and they need your help! Someone has eaten all the Warp Coins made by Marianne’s Chocolate! Use all of your skills and know-how to find the evidence that will clear your friend’s name and prove their innocence!

Want to support this game and get a physical copy? Click here to check out the Kickstarter. Even a small pledge helps pay the artists a crew for this game.

Controls: 
Z = A button
X = B button
Return/Enter = Start

*note - when playing in browser game will run slowly and muted until a button is pressed.

Game made by Proximity Sound
Art by CinnriStreusel
Music by Brave Shores
Music adapted for Game Boy by Emberlynn Bland

Game made with GBStudio
